ComicInfo.Summary:
Final issue in the character-defining Born Again miniseries! As her mysterious benefactor's agenda becomes clear, Jen and her psychopathic doppleganger finally square off in their ultimate death match. But even if she somehow survives that, she faces being mercilessly hunted by a world that now knows she's still alive. Where can you run to when everyone's out to get you? Does she face an endgame she can't possibly win, or can Jennifer Blood carve out a new direction for her life and gain a new lease on death?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Stephen Segovia | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Stephen Segovia | 2 |
